title: Laughter is Really the Best Medicine
itunes:author: Guest: Phil Callaway
itunes:summary:
Phil Callaway is certain that laughter and a sense of gratitude are the keys to overcoming the stresses of everyday life. He shares how the Lord reminded him of that lesson through the extreme stress of his wife’s serious illness and subsequent remarkable recovery.

Receive the book "Laugh Like a Kid Again" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-07-20?refcd=1445904&treatment=one-time-gift

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/laughter-really-is-the-best-medicine/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
